Name: Wave Mechanics
About the game: The goal of Wave Mechanics is to match the color of each element to the colors of corresponding parts of the frame. Each puzzle includes a set of active elements that can by used in order to change the colors of all elements within range in chosen direction, bear in mind however that the range of an active element decreases after each use. Key Features: - elegant design - 49 procedurally generated puzzles each time you start a new game
